ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/java var objectName = p('salesforce.objects.customerInteraction') var limitValue = attributes.queryParams.limit default "100" var offsetValue = attributes.queryParams.offset default "0" --- "SELECT Id, Interaction_Type__c, Direction__c, Transcript__c, Interaction_Date__c, Related_Customer__c, Case__c FROM $(objectName) ORDER BY Interaction_Date__c DESC LIMIT $(limitValue) OFFSET $(offsetValue)"

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- payload map (item, index) -> { Id: item.Id, Interaction_Type__c: item.Interaction_Type__c, Direction__c: item.Direction__c, Transcript__c: item.Transcript__c, Interaction_Date__c: item.Interaction_Date__c, Related_Customer__c: item.Related_Customer__c, Case__c: item.Case__c }

%dw 2.0 output application/java --- [{ Interaction_Type__c: payload.Interaction_Type__c, Direction__c: payload.Direction__c, (Transcript__c: payload.Transcript__c) if (payload.Transcript__c != null), Interaction_Date__c: payload.Interaction_Date__c, Related_Customer__c: payload.Related_Customer__c, (Case__c: payload.Case__c) if (payload.Case__c != null) }]

salesforce:query.doc:name: Query Created Record
salesforce:query.salesforce:salesforce-query: #["SELECT Id, Interaction_Type__c, Direction__c, Transcript__c, Interaction_Date__c, Related_Customer__c, Case__c FROM $(p('salesforce.objects.customerInteraction')) WHERE Id = '$(vars.createdId)'"]

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { Id: payload[0].Id, Interaction_Type__c: payload[0].Interaction_Type__c, Direction__c: payload[0].Direction__c, Transcript__c: payload[0].Transcript__c, Interaction_Date__c: payload[0].Interaction_Date__c, Related_Customer__c: payload[0].Related_Customer__c, Case__c: payload[0].Case__c }

logger.doc:name: Log Failure
logger.message: Failed to create customer interaction in Salesforce

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { error: "CREATION_FAILED", message: payload[0].errors[0].message default "Failed to create record", timestamp: now(), correlationId: vars.correlationId }
